title: Bao Fan, Banker in China Who Vanished, Is Said to Be Aiding Inquiry
description: In a filing on Sunday, China Renaissance Bank said that its C.E.O., Bao Fan, was “cooperating in an investigation” by Chinese authorities.

title: Why Do A.I. Chatbots Tell Lies and Act Weird? Look in the Mirror.
description: One of the pioneers of artificial intelligence argues that chatbots are often prodded into producing strange results by the people who are using them.
